Name: FireMage
Description:
The FireMage is a powerfull wizard wich is specialized in the manipulation of fire.
Very familiar with big explosions, this champion releases all his power againts big packs of monsters.
However, you should be very careful because of its lack of defensive stats.

Name: Windiator
Description: This is a description of the Windiator

Name: SummonerNeutral
Description: This is a description of the SummonerNeutral

Name: SummonerMono
Description:
DPS Monotarget form of the summoner.
This form has powerfull and quick spells that deals big damages on ONE target at a time. 
Choose the right target and MAKE HIM PAY !!

Name: SummonerAOE
Description:
The most destructive (and BADASS) form of the summoner.
This form has powerfull and dangerous AOE spells that can deal a big amount of damages. 
Use theses spells carefully or it will lead you to your doom!

Name: SummonerSupport
Description:
The support form of the summoner.
This form has very effective crowd control spells and some powerfull protection and heal abilities.
With great power comes great responsibility !
